original:
Early reviews of the platform economy generally opposed the imposition of stringent regulations. However, beginning in 2016 and particularly in 2017, several jurisdictions adopted a more interventionist stance. Platform workers often experience irregular and extended working hours, which can increase their risk of cardiovascular diseases.



Businesses that operated on principles similar to those of contemporary digital platforms have e
